Parses and colors a message, and substitutes any of the supported shortcuts.

Parse a given message for color keys, and color the message appropriately.
parseStringForInstance(String, ChatColor, CommandInstance) - Static method in class io.github.zachohara.bukkit.common.util.StringUtil
Parses a given message for supported shortcuts, and substitutes in relevant information from the source and context of a command.
parseText(String, ChatColor, CommandInstance) - Static method in class io.github.zachohara.bukkit.common.util.StringUtil
Parses a given message, substitutes any of the supported shortcuts, and colors the message to be the given color.
PLAYER_CHAT_WIDTH - Static variable in class io.github.zachohara.bukkit.common.util.StringUtil
The width, in characters, of the default player-side chat box.
playerIsAdmin(Player) - Static method in class io.github.zachohara.bukkit.common.util.PlayerUtil
Determines if a given player is the admin of this server by comparing UUID values.
PlayerUtil - Class in io.github.zachohara.bukkit.common.util
The PlayerUtil class outlines some useful static methods that are relevant to players in the game.
